snippet.title: Sorry We're Closed | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Sorry We're Closed on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1796580/Sorry_Were_Closed/

Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic single player survival horror game with rich lore and character interactions that allow multiple endings. Following the end days of Michelle, explore unsettling locations using the environment to hide and survive. Use your demon gun to defend in first person.

To learn more about à la mode and Akupara Games, visit:
►Akupara Games: linktr.ee/akuparagames
►à la mode: https://twitter.com/alamodegames
